item.title: Making maps in Python
item.description: In my NZ project, I decided to plot my results entirely in Python to keep the pipeline simple. Turned out if you can fix the projection, you are half-way there.

item.title: JupyterLab how-to
item.description: Start: jupyter lab Interactive matplotlib plot %matplotlib widget

item.title: OpenQuake
item.description: OpenQuake is a Python package created by the Global Earthquake Model foundation (GEM) for producing [[PSHA]] models. It does not support [[Python#Conda|conda]] install however.

item.title: Pandas
item.description: I am unable to leave pandas because I work with catalogs. But I hear good things about xarray Basic Dataframes Change column name: emme14.
